name: Chewbacca's Bowcaster
Lore: 'Specially modified by Chewbacca. Fires larger bolts with more accuracy. Superior targeting at long distances.',
Text: 'Deploy on Chewie, or use 4 Force to deploy on your other Wookiee. May target a character, creature or vehicle using 3 Force (for free if Chewie firing). Draw two destiny. Target hit if total destiny > defense value. If hit by Chewie, target''s forfeit = 0.',
